title: Ticket #5960: Continue rename of Capability to ClaimId in private startd ad
description:
In Condor 7.1.x, we started the process of renaming the Capability attribute to ClaimId in the private startd ad. We then forgot about it. We should finish the switch and then forgot about the old Capability name. ClaimId better matches the other attribute names we use for storing claims (ChildClaimIds, ClaimIds, ClaimIdList).

For 8.5, do the following:

  • The startd should use the "new" ClaimId attribute, while still setting Capability.
  • Update code in the collector and schedd to expect either attribute.
  • Add ClaimIdList to the set of private attribute names.

These are not user-visible changes, so no version history is required.
check_ins: 2016-Oct-12 14:23   Check-in [49411]: Continue rename of Capability to ClaimId in private startd ads. #5960 (By Jaime Frey )
